title: Vardebukta Formation
text: The Vardebukta Formation is a <a href="Formation%20%28geology%29">geologic formation</a> in <a href="Norway">Norway</a>. It preserves <a href="fossil">fossil</a>s dating back to the <a href="Early%20Triassic">Early Triassic</a> (<a href="Dienerian">Dienerian</a>) <a href="Period%20%28geology%29">period</a>.
